
curl -X POST 'http://localhost:8080/auth/realms/my_realm/protocol/openid-connect/token' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' \
--data-urlencode 'grant_type=password' \
--data-urlencode 'client_id=my_client' \
--data-urlencode 'client_secret=ccf4955c-b206-4b78-80b1-139aac3393c4' \
--data-urlencode 'username=user_admin' \
--data-urlencode 'password=1' | jq



1. realm 만들기
2. client 만들고 내부에 ROLE 생성하기
- ROLE_ADMIN (실제 스프링에서 ADMIN 권한 맵핑)
- ROLE_USER (실제 스프링에서 USER 권한 맵핑)
3. user 만들고 이전에 만들 ROLE 맵핑하기
- user 에 여러 권한 맵핑이 가능

curl -X GET 'http://localhost:8000/test/admin' \
--header 'Authorization: bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCIgOiAiSldUIiwia2lkIiA6ICI4Q1ZzS2JqbGhsQTRUQk9mSExOcUtYT2FmVnpyaVUyQzRjUDV0c0ZENGFBIn0..jH9k4xRv8apQqlO2Qf41DaUL8bX4cDlOidvslqpTZY82qL8KdT6u92H_SDdmgvVbKmBAQf10OQRx6rJ1opVQ8QWrFULghhiGnXTNs8lSLvp5jXfXoh5aOT-UbnNxAdaEyqsoXFz9EzkcFYf9e7AaTfLweRu5NOnBhcNlfKbTpnM8rx0RNVpe0WjooYA7h_xTieWDBmYOZpH7EzSjSSheKkt7qfLiVzXEz5XgYYesAb_8m55ZpRkm3wGyv60lewjmqRD73c_T-OIVOh6JKL_c-Oqq8hmubHGSUv7ZaZtUEvj4YindyIOC6Xkq_uYzLjck7vkTE09Av5O6Ocry-7E2pQ'

--header 'Authorization: bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCIgOiAiSldUIiwia2lkIiA6ICI4Q1ZzS2JqbGhsQTRUQk9mSExOcUtYT2FmVnpyaVUyQzRjUDV0c0ZENGFBIn0..dsy7ps3siW-wNSl3RcVQtQecwGjy6CQ1z1hQxU6_itzD28K5rV1ezUt3h-Yta_xcc3Jqnrn0PmdLDe-IX0iMU7aev--AW4XtyFvItADB5Y6TazDTj_f0B-8b-sda5GGRXUzEcrjxD2fCL_z4YMEiua0okyxG3Ut4VHu7xFRJnxdz5MoRf4AzMWUAyGbL602slg4i_1_7ObTFU7BXbIKRB-ttxwWuKS2I8GrFXptSXkEab7mRRkpLuPc1W3QcxNRMnpv6gA1_fLWfeOqLKtiDKRgVVluhqKpvYThgPxDhlfY5WYgmQUMNjMuc1UfoxJBn_58ZtLVj1ICdPWz813oY_Q'
